other_tests.findings: Flushed face, dilated pupils, sweating, tremor, hyperactive deep tendon reflexes, slight tenderness at the right costal margin over the liver.
Initially given 20mg by mouth, repeated every 4 hours for the first 24 hours.
50mg given intramuscularly, followed by daily multivitamins.
Confusion, hallucinations about 'big beetles', significant agitation, elevated temperature (101.2Â°F), elevated pulse (140 bpm), and rapid respiration (25/min).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Following treatment, hallucinations ceased, and overall condition improved within the first night.

other_tests.findings: Continued an uneventful recovery at the PHS hospital.
